name: Geography
description: This category includes the entries dealing with the natural environment and the effects of human activity.

name: People and Society
description: This category includes entries dealing with national identity (including ethnicities, languages, and religions), demography (a variety of population statistics) and societal characteristics (health and education indicators).

name: Government
description: This category includes the entries dealing with the system for the adoption and administration of public policy.

name: Economy
description: This category includes the entries dealing with the size, development, and management of productive resources, i.e., land, labor, and capital.

name: Energy
description: This category includes entries dealing with the production, consumption, import, and export of various forms of energy including electricity, crude oil, refined petroleum products, and natural gas.

name: Communications
description: This category deals with the means of exchanging information and includes the telephone, radio, television, and Internet host entries.

name: Transportation
description: This category includes the entries dealing with the means for movement of people and goods.

name: Military
description: This category includes the entries dealing with a country's military structure, manpower, and expenditures.
